Task-3_key4: Pichle wale question meh app ek `string` di ja rahi ti jiske akhir me agar `'ing'` hogi toh ushe aage apko `'ly'` add karna ta ab apko `'ing'` ko hata ke `'ly'` add karna hai aur baki sab wese hi honge.
